ygData.subject: Re: DE Necro banking in RiverVale ?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/9/99 11:57:37 AM Pacific Daylight Time, MurphyK@umsystem.edu writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/9/99 11:57:37 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
MurphyK@... writes:

<< Is it possible to get a DE Necromancer's faction up high enough in
rivervale
to bank? >>

I have heard of A dark elf say on a message board he was able to get his
faction to the point he could bank he saids he was still unable to seel or
buy but could bank. I beta I know there was a Troll shadowknight who did the
same.

Zakrell
ps a GM told me it was possible even for a Dark Elf to enter the high elf
city hehhee now thats a faction adjustment :)
